title: The King and the Wizard
description: TSOI is a story in the Science Fiction/Fantasy genre. The initial story begins with many of the traditional elements of a Fantasy story – A wizard, a king, orbs granting “magical” powers, a medieval-type setting, but then progresses toward a more traditional Sci/Fi theme when technology and many of the classic elements of Science Fiction begin to emerge and grow as the story unfolds. Complete
author: Jamie de Valen
